Kadara Enyeasi bụ onye Naijiria na-ese foto.
Kadara malitere ịse foto nke ezinụlọ dị nso mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na igwefoto Nikon 2-megapixel. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Lagos na

Ọrụ ya gosipụtara na Lagos Photo Festival na 2015 na 2017. E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi Zeitz MOCAA, Still Here Tomorrow To High Five You Yesterday (2019). A haziri ọrụ ya dị ka akụkụ nke nchịkọta nke e gosipụtara na nwa agbọghọ Art X Lagos na 2016. Ọrụ ya pụtara na CNN, Vogue na Foam X African Artists' Foundation site na Foam Fotografiemuseum.
A họpụtara ya maka Edwin George Prize for Photography na Future Awards Africa 2017.
